policy_html:
Hello, researchers!

Now you are reading vulners.com bug bounty program description...it's quite good!
Most of us don't like to do that :)

So, what we have in the scope:

https://vulners.com website

https://telegram.me/vulnersBot Telegram Bot

What to search? Anything you can.

Any money for bugs? Sorry, no. vulners.com is freeware project, so we don't have any funds :)

Public disclosure? Sure!

Our technology stack is:
Python 3.5
Django latest version
Elasticsearch 2.*
MongoDB 3.*
UWSGI
Nginx
Memcached

So please, forget about sqlmap and other sql-injection oriented stuff. It's useless.

Actually, that's all.
Let's make this world little bit more secure together :)
